name: @deskpro-apps/iframe
title: IFrame
description: Embed an IFrame in the global component so you can display any website or web app.

iframe_url.title: IFrame URL
iframe_url.description: The URL to load in the iframe (must be https). Some URLs do not support being accessed via an iframe, so when you get the error <website> refused to connect, it means it can't be loaded in an iframe.

iframe_height_pixels.title: Column Height
iframe_height_pixels.description: The height of the column in which the iframe will be displayed

iframe_width_pixels.title: Column Width
iframe_width_pixels.description: The width of the column in which the iframe will be displayed
